Now that newsrooms have shrunk, beat reporters usually handle the features and longer stories on their beat. Very few outlets still have breaking news reporters specifically dedicated to a beat.

That means shorter breaking-news style articles are usually written by early-career news general assignment reporters on insanely short deadlines, which usually aggregate the other news. All it takes is a few reputable folks saying misinformation, and boom, itâ€™s getting propagated by hundreds of people without the knowledge or ability or time to fact check.
